caption:
This photograph captures a serene lake setting during what appears to be the late afternoon or early evening, given the lighting conditions. The image features a broad, tranquil lake with a shimmering surface reflecting some of the dusky sky. On the far side, the land gently slopes upwards, covered with dense greenery and trees. A few houses are nestled discretely among the trees, partially hidden by the foliage.

On the left side of the image, there is a small sandy beach area where several people can be seen engaged in various activities. Some individuals are standing by the waterâ€™s edge, possibly chatting or simply enjoying the view, while others are in the water swimming or wading near a floating dock. A couple of small boats with people are also visible closer to the middle of the lake, adding a dynamic element to the peaceful scenery.

Overall, the composition and the soft focus lend the photograph a calm and somewhat nostalgic feel, evoking a sense of relaxation and leisure typical of lakeside retreats. The colors are generally muted with shades of green, blue, and touches of earth tones, reinforcing the tranquility of the scene.
title: Here at Clinton, in the first quarter mile from its origin below the Wachusett Reservoir, the Nashua River is still safe for swimming. Beyond this point, up to its end at the Merrimack River in New Hampshire, the Nashua is polluted.
